name: kantele
description: A traditional Finnish plucked string instrument played over the lap. It has a distinctive bell-like sound.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your kantele.
You play a haunting, forlorn tune with your kantele.
You play a kantele rendition of Säkkijärven Polkka.

name: egg vibrator
description: A discreet adult toy perfect for winding down and relaxing. Not as powerful as a regular vibrator, but takes up less space.
